eu.amidst.core.datastream.filereaders.arffFileReader

Class ARFFDataWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.datastream.filereaders.arffFileReader.ARFFDataWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataFileWriter

    public class ARFFDataWriter
extends Object
implements DataFileWriter
    This class implements the interface DataFileWriter and defines an ARFF (Weka Attribute-Relation File Format) data writer.

        public static void writeToARFFFile(DataStream<? extends DataInstance> dataStream,
                                   String path)
                            throws IOException
        Saves a given data stream to an ARFF file.
        Parameters:
        dataStream - an input DataStream.
        path - the path of the ARFF file where the data stream will be saved.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an error when writing to file
